reviews.text: It was the first building, in a long line of many impressive buildings on the Passeig de Gràcia. Have your time when visiting this street and keep your head up! Always something nice to see.. Casas Pascual i Pons, which was built in 1890-1891, is an enormous six-storey building, with a symmetrical composition as a facade and elements of clear Gothic inspiration, especially visible in the openings.
